column3: This requires rebase, but I'll leave it as it is until #11771 is reviewed/merged.

This requires rebase now that #11771 has been merged.

Review comments from @conscott to address in this PR:

- [x] unused update to `block_time` variable can be removed (https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11771#discussion_r167710791)
- [x] unused update to `height` variable can be removed (https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11771#pullrequestreview-95970049)
- [x] `send_txs_a
Thanks to @conscott for rebasing this and fixing up the remaining issues from #11771 and Russ's review comment.

> Not an issue with your code, but __eq__() is not implemented for CTransaction, so the argument to assert is always true, since none of the tx objects are the same reference (they were copied).\n\nAgree - this assert: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/00d1680498c5550e7db1f359202d3433a092fafd/test/functional/p2p_invalid_block.py#L83 should be removed in a future PR.
In commit "Change invalidblockrequest to use BitcoinTestFramework"\n\nMaybe avoid 0x prefix here and above by calling int(hash, 16)
